content: S-B (IMP) Diamond impact screwdriver bit High-performance screwdriver bit with diamond coating and impact zone for use with impact screwdrivers ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Bits and sockets- ### FEATURES:Features Elastic torsion zone in the bit shank cushions higher loads – the bit twists slightly under impact which helps to extend the service life Diamond coating for a more secure fit in the screw – virtually eliminates slipping and jumping out Shock-resistant tool steel selected for use with impact drivers – reduces the risk of premature bit breakage Perfect-fit geometry for greater driving grip, precision-machined to reduce stripping and wobbling Applications ¼ hexagon connection end for use with all common bit holders (DIN ISO 1173-D 6.3) Suitable for use with conventional impact drivers Recommended for hard-joint applications e.g. in metal or concrete Driving screws and screw anchors in a variety of materials ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2039116 - Driver bit S-B PH2 25/1 IMP (10) - Package Size 10 pc - 2039126 - Driver bit S-B PH2 50/2 IMP (5) - Package Size 5 pc - 2039132 - Driver bit S-B TX30 50/2 IMP (5) - Package Size 5 pc
tag_description: High-performance screwdriver bit with diamond coating and impact zone for use with impact screwdrivers
